text: Maisa da Silva Andrade (born 22 May 2002) is a Brazilian television host and actress. She is known for hosting the children's TV show Bom Dia & Cia since she was 6 years old and for playing the role of Valéria Ferreira in the Carrossel franchise, including a telenovela and two movies. ==Career== At the age of 3, in 2005, Maisa appeared in the Programa Raul Gil as musical lipsyncer, singer and also stage secretary stage of presenter Raul Gil, on Rede Record and then on Band. In 2007, she signed with SBT to present children's programs Sábado Animado and Domingo Animado. In 2008, she was invited to star a segment in the Programa Silvio Santos, becoming a success for answering random questions by presenter Silvio Santos, owner of SBT and icon of Brazilian television. Maisa was sometimes called a "prodigy girl" and "the girl's on Silvio Santos's eyes" by the Brazilian media. Since then, she has been one of the leading artists of the network. In 2017 she presents her own program "Programa da Maisa" at SBT. In 2019 Maisa Silva is hired by Netflix Brazil. ===Leaving SBT=== After 13 years at SBT, she decided not to renew with the broadcaster because of new personal and professional projects that Maisa has the will to do. ===Internet=== Maisa began posting videos to her YouTube channel (named Maisera) in 2014, at age 12, with vlogs, interviews, music videos and other stuff. Maisa has millions of followers on her social networks. In 2015, she was the number one on iFruit agency "five most influential children of Brazil" list. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !!
